name: Invincible Conqueror
description: You can magically become an avatar of conquest, gaining the following benefits for 1 minute: You have resistance to all damage; When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can make one additional attack as part of that action; Your melee weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20. Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.
